types.html:
poudre de perlimpinpin f (usually uncountable, plural poudres de perlimpinpin)

  1. a powder, purported to have magic powers, formerly sold by charlatans
  2. (by extension, idiomatic) snake oil (a fraudulent cure-all or remedy)
    • 2017, Emmanuel Macron, 2017, le débat, TF1/France 2:
      Donc ce que vous proposez, comme d'habitude, c'est de la poudre de perlimpinpin.
      So what you have to offer, as usual, is nothing but snake oil.
trans: a powder, purported to have magic powers, formerly sold by charlatans

title: poudre de perlimpinpin
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pu.dʁə d(ə) pɛʁ.lɛ̃.pɛ̃.pɛ̃/
